Memberships
2025 Annual Membership
Unlimited golf
Tee time reservations 14 days in advance
Discounted cart fee (cart included with purchase of Annual Cart Trail Fee)
20% off merchandise in Pro Shop
Complimentary GHIN handicap service ($30 value)
No equity deposit, no assessments, no minimums
Single – $4,075 plus tax
Couple – $5,950 plus tax
2025 Annual Trail Fee
Single – $2,375 plus tax
Couple – $4,075 plus tax
3 Month Snowbird Membership
(Any 3 consecutive months)
Tee time reservations 14 days in advance
Discounted cart fee
Guests receive our best E-Club rate
$2 discount on small range basket
Single – $2,650 plus tax
Couple – $3,750 plus tax
For additional information, call (772) 283-1500.

Course News
wp:paragraph
New driving range balls and targets!
/wp:paragraph
wp:paragraph
Join Darla and the rest of the welcoming staff at Champ’s Bar and Grill for delicious daily lunch specials.
/wp:paragraph
wp:paragraph
8:30 Ladies League every Tuesday and Friday
8:45 Men’s League every Monday and Thursday
/wp:paragraph
wp:paragraph
*Dress Code Policy - The Champions Club at Summerfield would like to remind patrons that proper golf attire is required at the golf course and at our practice areas. Generally, proper golf attire permits Bermuda-length shorts, khakis/slacks, and collared shirts. The policy prohibits denim, cut-offs, cargo shorts, and tee shirts. We want everyone to enjoy the facility and we appreciate your cooperation and understanding.
/wp:paragraph
wp:paragraph
/wp:paragraph

Phone: (772) 283-1500
Book Tee Times
Book Member Tee Times
Join E-Club
Book Golf Event
Give us a call at 772-283-1500 to book an event today!
We are very successful with groups of 8 to 120 people. We offer a complete package for your outing including food and drinks, staff, and supplies for whatever your group would like to experience. Our head professional and GM, David Ladd will direct and ensure a great experience from the time guests drive in until the time they drive out.
We offer a complete package here for your Golf Outing – for whatever your group would like to experience. We will provide supplies and products from the pro shop and food and drinks from The Champions Grille. We look forward to the opportunity to serve you and your group for an outing to remember!
Book Golf Event
Give us a call at 772-283-1500 to book an event today!
We are very successful with groups of 8 to 120 people. We offer a complete package for your outing including food and drinks, staff, and supplies for whatever your group would like to experience. Our head professional and GM, David Ladd will direct and ensure a great experience from the time guests drive in until the time they drive out.
We offer a complete package here for your Golf Outing – for whatever your group would like to experience. We will provide supplies and products from the pro shop and food and drinks from The Champions Grille. We look forward to the opportunity to serve you and your group for an outing to remember!

The Best Experience Possible
The Champion’s Club’s mission is to provide its guests with a premier daily fee facility. We strive to provide consistent quality playing conditions, and wonderful customer service from our staff. We strive to exceed our clients expectations while providing a warm and inviting environment. Thank you; enjoy our golf course, grill and practice range and green, and when you’re ready to improve your game further – give David Ladd a call with the DLadd Golf Academy. Please feel free to let us know how we are doing and make it a great day!
The Champions Golf Club 1-772-283-1500
David Ladd, PGA
GM/Director of Golf
david@davidladd.com

Join E-Club
About Us
The Golf Course:
Built in 1993, our course is a par-72, 18-hole course designed by Tom Fazio. It measures 6,890 yards from the gold tees if you want a true challenge. The blue tees play at 6313 yards, white at 5771, and green at 4977.
Facilities:
You will see our driving range as you enter the property. Next to it we have just completed a brand new, half acre chipping area complete with a bunker and three pin locations. Our putting green is behind the clubhouse.

Facilities:
